etymologies: 1940s: from Krypton, the name of Superman's home planet (kryptonite is usually depicted as a green mineral that came to earth from Krypton, following its destruction)

definitions: (in the fictional word of the comic book, TV, and film character Superman) an alien mineral that has the property of depriving Superman of his powers

examples.text: the evil Lex Luthor diminishes Superman's powers with kryptonite

shortDefinitions: alien mineral with property of depriving Superman of his powers

definitions: something that can seriously weaken or harm a particular person or thing

examples.text: flip-flopping on issues can be kryptonite to presidential candidates
such uncertainties are kryptonite for the bond market

shortDefinitions: something that can seriously weaken particular person or thing
